Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec™M Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTecTM Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Q* Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTec™ Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Q Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA technology for direct qualitative detection of N. gonorrhoeae DNA in multiple specimen types with BD Viper System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in endocervical, urethral, vaginal swabs, urine, and PreservCyt gynecological specimens to aid in diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in symptomatic and asymptomatic females and symptomatic males
